lead_paragraph: Nicholas Young, a transit officer, is the first American law enforcement officer to be charged with supporting the Islamic State.

headline.print_headline: Police Officer Is Charged With Aiding ISIS
headline.main: Washington Transit Officer Is Charged With Helping ISIS

snippet: Nicholas Young, a transit officer, is the first American law enforcement officer to be charged with supporting the Islamic State....
abstract: Federal law enforcement officials charge Nicholas Young, police officer with Washington transit system, with attempting to provide material support to Islamic State militant group; charge is first action of its kind against American law enforcement officer.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
